profile:
Knechtel Door Systems is a garage door specialist for residential, commercial, agricultural and industrial applications, proudly serving the Simcoe area. We would love for you to visit our showroom at 3252 Cockshutt Rd. There, our team can give you personalized advice in purchasing a garage door, an installation that meets the highest industry standards, and unequalled after-sales service thanks to our maintenance and repair program.  

Our full range of products also includes electric garage door openers as well as many other accessories to go with your garage door. Think of us when it comes to buying, installing or repairing any type of garage door. We are a member of the (CDI).  

Our showroom is located at 3252 Cockshutt Rd in Scotland and is open Monday to Friday from 8 AM to 4 PM and evenings by appointment. 

I invite you to come and visit us, and on behalf of our entire team, I thank you for considering our company. 

John Reid
Owner
Knechtel Door Systems
hours: Monday to Friday from 8 AM to 4 PM and evenings by appointment.
